explanation: need_100_continue directly calls MHD_lookup_connection_value_n and MHD_str_equal_caseless_. To prove whether need_100_continue participates in any direct or indirect recursion you must examine the bodies of those callees and any transitive callees to see if they (directly or via further calls) call back into need_100_continue. MHD_str_equal_caseless_ itself calls charsequalcaseless, so charsequalcaseless must also be inspected (and any functions it calls). These symbols form the transitive callee set visible from the static call graph and are therefore required to determine if a cycle back to need_100_continue exists.
